TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2SecurityKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

Docs.summary: This class is used when a Saml2Assertion is received without a <ds:KeyInfo> element inside the signature element. The KeyInfo describes the key required to check the signature. When the key is needed this clause will be presented to the current . It will contain the Saml2Assertion fully read which can be queried to determine the key required.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion assertion) cil managed

Docs.param: The assertion that is currently being processed. Sets the value of the property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The assertion can be queried to obtain information about the issuer when resolving the key needed to check the signature. The assertion will be read completely when this clause is passed to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver> object.

Docs.summary: Gets the Saml2Assertion that is currently associated with this instance.
Docs.value: The Saml2Assertion that is currently associated with this instance. Can be .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The assertion can be queried to obtain information about the issuer when resolving the key needed to check the signature.
The assertion returned may be `null`.
